mapper.select: select #{ORDERNUM} as ordernum, #{ORDERWHERE} as orderwhere, #{ORDERIN} as orderin, sysdate as today, #{COUPON} as coupon from ORDERCODE
mapper.insert: insert into MENU (foodnum, foodname, foodtype, foodprice, foodsoldout, foodlev) values (#{foodnum}, #{foodname}, #{foodtype}, #{foodprice}, #{foodsoldout}, #{foodlev})
